name: The Game of Squids: Ultimate Parody Game
name_original: The Game of Squids: Ultimate Parody Game
description: A crazy and colorful runner in a cartoon style, where the player has to go through many rooms with various trials and try to survive. The game contains a huge number of references, parodies and memes to make fun. Overcome terrifying and funny traps, dodge objects flying at you, and collect various cosmetic items to be different from other squid!
